duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and integrate the procurement function across the Company, assessing existing practices, and developing a perspective on key changes needed to improve the function.
Manage the procurement function, including supplier negotiation, selection, and management, capability building, and acquisition integration.
Collaborate cross-functionally to enable day-to-day operations and report on procurement metrics, savings, and performance.
Assess potential risks in the supply chain and develop mitigation strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Supply Chain Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
